subject: [Radiance-general] gendaymtx axis convention and -O 1 option.
body:
Dear list,

My bad, the convention is as I thought; and everything seem to work
correctly.

Still wondering about the -O option though.

THANKS ANYWAY TO ALL

German

2013/3/11 Germ?n Molina Larrain <gmolina1 at uc.cl>
